## MemoryDIDStore class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

An implementation of [AbstractDIDStore](./did-manager.abstractdidstore.md) that stores everything in memory.

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MemoryDIDStore extends AbstractDIDStore
```

<b>Extends:</b> [AbstractDIDStore](./did-manager.abstractdidstore.md)
